mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TRIO_ITEMS (item_name, category_code, item_price, factory_code, item_size, item_color) VALUES (#{itemName},#{categoryCode},#{itemPrice},#{factoryCode},#{itemSize},#{itemColor})
mapper.select: SELECT purchase_code, pur.item_code, purchase_qty, factory_code, item_name, category_name, item_size, item_color FROM TRIO_PURCHASE pur, TRIO_ITEMS item, TRIO_CATEGORY cate WHERE pur.item_code = item.item_code AND item.category_code = cate.category_code
